content: That's a lot of great information to consider. I think I'll need to weigh the pros and cons of each option more carefully. Since I've been wanting to get into video more, the Z6's video capabilities are definitely appealing. But at the same time, I'm heavily invested in F-mount lenses and I love the autofocus performance of my D850. Can you tell me more about the autofocus system on the Z6? How does it compare to the D850's autofocus system?
